descriptionlist.description: BatteryInfo what can BatteryInfo do ? BatteryInfo shows you all your batteries which are connected with your Iphone like AirPods, Apple Watch, Speaker Box and more. How can i see my Batteries ? You will see all your batteries when you getting notification from your system.

BatteryInfo costs 2.00 â‚¬ how you can buy it ? just install it and go into BatteryInfo settings then copy your UDID from the tweak settings then click "Buy Tweak" and send it to me on Twitter i'll send you my PayPal so you can purchase it. Mudi4_7 after you have sent the amount, send me a screenshot of PayPal that you have sent it !
